Wrapd 0.0.22-SNAPSHOT API

Wrapd is a SQL amplifier, a lightweight database abstraction layer generator and schema migrator that helpfully exposes SQL in Java rather than hiding it.
Packages
Package Description
org.reldb.wrapd.exceptions
Exceptions.
org.reldb.wrapd.generator
Java code generation.
org.reldb.wrapd.il8n
Internationalised strings.
org.reldb.wrapd.response
Tools for handling a variety of method responses.
org.reldb.wrapd.schema
Tools for migrating schemas and managing schema change.
org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb
Tools for interacting with a SQL DBMS.
org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb.sqlite
Customisations specifically for SQLite.
org.reldb.wrapd.tuples
Tools for representing ResultSet entries as class instances.
org.reldb.wrapd.version
Tools to obtain this library's version.
